languages.text: "С вашего позволения, Лорд-капитан, я бы предпочел оставаться рядом с вами. Господин проктор, безусловно, профессионал своего дела, но он не ваш сенешаль".

traits.locale_text: [draft] "С вашего позволения, я предпочел бы остаться с вами, Лорд-капитан. Господин проктор, безусловно, профессионал своего дела, но он не ваш сенешаль. А я... я не прощу себе, если с вами что-нибудь случится, и меня не будет рядом".
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "With your permission, Lord Captain, I would prefer to remain at your side. The Proctor's expertise is indisputable, but he is not your Seneschal."
languages.original_text: "С вашего позволения, Лорд-капитан, я бы предпочел оставаться рядом с вами. Господин проктор, безусловно, профессионал своего дела, но он не ваш сенешаль".

traits.locale_text: "With your permission, Lord Captain, I would prefer to remain at your side. The Proctor's expertise is indisputable, but he is not your Seneschal."
"With your permission, Lord Captain, I would prefer to remain at your side. The Proctor's expertise is indisputable, but he is not your Seneschal."
"With your permission, Lord Captain, I would prefer to remain at your side. The Proctor's expertise is indisputable, but he is not your Seneschal."
"With your permission, Lord Captain, I would prefer to remain at your side. The Proctor's expertise is indisputable, but he is not your Seneschal."
"With your permission, Lord Captain, I would prefer to remain at your side. The Proctor's expertise is indisputable, but he is not your Seneschal."
"With your permission, Lord Captain, I would prefer to remain at your side. The Proctor's expertise is indisputable, but he is not your Seneschal."

languages.text: "Mit Eurer Erlaubnis, Lord Captain, würde ich es vorziehen, an Eurer Seite zu bleiben. Die Expertise des Proktors ist unbestritten, aber er ist nicht Euer Truchsess."
languages.original_text: "With your permission, Lord Captain, I would prefer to remain at your side. The Proctor's expertise is indisputable, but he is not your Seneschal."

traits.locale_text: "Mit Eurer Erlaubnis, Lord Captain, würde ich es vorziehen, an Eurer Seite zu bleiben. Die Expertise des Proktors ist unbestritten, aber er ist nicht Euer Truchsess."

languages.text: « Avec votre permission, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}, je préférerais rester à vos côtés. L'expertise du proctor est indéniable, mais il n'est pas votre sénéchal. »
languages.original_text: "With your permission, Lord Captain, I would prefer to remain at your side. The Proctor's expertise is indisputable, but he is not your Seneschal."

traits.locale_text: « Avec votre permission, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}, je préférerais rester à vos côtés. L'expertise du proctor est indéniable, mais il n'est pas votre sénéchal. »

languages.text: “如果您允许，我更希望能留在您身边，舰长大人。尽管监察官的专业能力不容置疑，但他毕竟不是您的总领。”
languages.original_text: "With your permission, Lord Captain, I would prefer to remain at your side. The Proctor's expertise is indisputable, but he is not your Seneschal."

traits.locale_text: “如果您允许，我更希望能留在您身边，舰长大人。尽管监察官的专业能力不容置疑，但他毕竟不是您的总领。”

languages.text: «Con su permiso, Lord Capitán, preferiría mantenerme a su lado. Los conocimientos del Procurador son indiscutibles, pero no es su Senescal».
languages.original_text: "With your permission, Lord Captain, I would prefer to remain at your side. The Proctor's expertise is indisputable, but he is not your Seneschal."

traits.locale_text: «Con su permiso, Lord Capitán, preferiría mantenerme a su lado. Los conocimientos del Procurador son indiscutibles, pero no es su Senescal».

languages.text: 「ロード・キャプテン、お許しいただけるのであれば、私はあなたの側に留まりたいと思います。代理人殿の手腕は疑う余地がありませんが、彼はあなたの家令長ではありませんから」
languages.original_text: "With your permission, Lord Captain, I would prefer to remain at your side. The Proctor's expertise is indisputable, but he is not your Seneschal."

traits.locale_text: 「ロード・キャプテン、お許しいただけるのであれば、私はあなたの側に留まりたいと思います。代理人殿の手腕は疑う余地がありませんが、彼はあなたの家令長ではありませんから」

languages.text: "İzninizle Lord Kaptan, sizin yanınızda kalmayı tercih ederim. Üsteğmen'in uzmanlığı tartışılmaz ama o sizin Seneşaliniz değil."
languages.original_text: "With your permission, Lord Captain, I would prefer to remain at your side. The Proctor's expertise is indisputable, but he is not your Seneschal."

traits.locale_text: "İzninizle Lord Kaptan, sizin yanınızda kalmayı tercih ederim. Üsteğmen'in uzmanlığı tartışılmaz ama o sizin Seneşal'iniz değil."
